protocol.name: P-GSE14663-1
text: ABS_CALL = the call in an absolute analysis that indicates if the transcript was present (P), absent (A), marginal (M), or no call (NC)
DETECTION P-VALUE = 'detection p-value', p-value that indicates the significance level of the detection call

protocol.name: P-GSE14663-2
protocol.text: Total RNA was prepared using RNeasy Plant Mini Kit (Qiagen) according to the manufacturer's instructions.

protocol.name: P-GSE14663-3
protocol.text: Biotinylated cRNA were prepared according to the standard Affymetrix protocol from 10 µg of total RNA.

protocol.name: P-GSE14663-7
protocol.text: Biotinylated cRNA were prepared according to the standard Affymetrix protocol from 10 μg of total RNA.

protocol.name: P-GSE14663-8
protocol.text: Total RNA was extracted applying ISOGEN (Nippon Gene) before using RNeasy Plant Mini Kit (Qiagen) according to the manufacturer's instructions.
